definition: to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin

sentences.english: According to Alice Hibberd film adapted from a best-selling novel.
sentences.chinese: 本片根据爱丽丝希伯德的畅销小说改编而成。

sentences.english: Collections of short jokes especially written for texters are best-sellers.
sentences.chinese: 那些专门为短信族编写的短篇笑话集也十分畅销。

sentences.english: Products bearing famous trademarks sell well.
sentences.chinese: 标有名牌商标的产品畅销。

sentences.english: All any articles are not selling lines.
sentences.chinese: 所有这一些产业商品都是咱们的畅销货。

sentences.english: “Forever” multiple speed racing bicycles are sure to be salable in your market.
sentences.chinese: 永久牌变速跑车在你们的市场上一定很畅销。

sentences.english: Autumn is a lively season for the wool market.
sentences.chinese: 秋天是毛织品畅销的季节。

sentences.english: According to Xie Wanglin's best-selling novel, based on the reality.
sentences.chinese: 根据谢旺霖同名畅销小说改编，真人真事为蓝本。

sentences.english: Hostesses are also writing best-selling books, be they on money management or the art of conversation.
sentences.chinese: 陪酒女们也写出了畅销书，讲述如何理财和谈话艺术。

sentences.english: The songs on this album became popular hits and were broadcast on television and radio station throughout Afghanistan.
sentences.chinese: 专辑歌曲如此畅销，阿富汗全国电视电台纷纷播送。

sentences.english: This book since 1930's sold over 60 million copies. One of the best sellers in history.
sentences.chinese: 从30年代至今销售超过6千万本，史上最畅销书籍。
他的书登上了畅销榜首。

sentences.english: While each shipment replenishes items that sell well, each also includes new items.
sentences.chinese: 每次运货都会去补足那些畅销品同时也会上新品。

sentences.english: Presently bestselling inside and out of province, sells in distant markets of Macao, soon infiltrates the international market.
sentences.chinese: 现畅销省内外，远销澳门，即将打入国际市场。

sentences.english: Smick, the international economic consultant and author of a bestselling book on the global economy.
sentences.chinese: 他著有一本关于世界经济的畅销书。

sentences.english: It was one of the best-sellers on the list of the New York Times.
sentences.chinese: 这本书被纽约时报列为最畅销书之一。

sentences.english: They were the three top-selling novels in Germany last year.
sentences.chinese: 去年，在德国，它们在畅销书中排名前三。

definition: to sell strongly/to be in great demand
to sell out/to run out (of supplies)/deficient/lack of supplies
(a product) sells well/to be in demand
(of a movie, show etc) to attract large audiences
to be published (of art, literary works etc)/to come out/to take shape/to see the light of day
